If you have a code snippet that causes this exception, it would help fix the cause instead of just fixing the symptom.

We can guard against the NPE, but it would also be helpful to find out why 
((ICPPClassType)t).getCompositeScope()
is returning null.

Without code snippits to help reproduce this, it'll be hard to see what's happening.

At any rate, the DOM source indexer is gone. Please try again with the newest CDT 3.1.
We are protecting against the Null Pointer, without a code example, there is nothing else we can do here.
Changing to target milestone to 4.0. This bug was fixed after 3.1.0. It may have been fixed in the 3.1 stream, but then it would be fixed in 4.0 too, hopefully...
